content.question: Why is the writer writing to Mr. Yamaguchi?

choices.label: She is inviting him to her high school graduation.
She wants to study at his language school.
She is interested in volunteering at his center.
She hopes he can translate a Vietnamese text for her.

content.answer: She is interested in volunteering at his center.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
